ResourceHeader.Description:
British Antarctic Survey is one of the world's leading environmental research centers
    and is responsible for the United Kingdon's national scientific activities in Antarctica. This site
    provide ground magnetometer data from a number of stations that are operated by several other
    institutes including: Japanese National Institute of Polar Research, Polar Research Institute of
    China, and TIstituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
British Antarctic Survey; Japanese National Institute of Polar Research; Polar
    Research Institute of China;  TIstituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia
